title: Acoustic - Volume 1
description: 21 Acoustic music themes suitable for intimate and friendly projects.
longDescription:
﻿Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Acoustic - Volume 1" features 21 acoustic music themes suitable for intimate and friendly projects. The arrangements include premium tenor ukulele, acoustic guitars, acoustic and electric piano, mellotron, glockenspiel, upright bass and many types of percussions. Every music theme comes with multiple loops and shorter edits for further editing.

Total amount of 1,75Gb of music. 


  • Acoustic Fingerpicking With Nature: Full length (01:51), 5 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • At The Park: Full length (01:29), 11 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Breakfast In The Garden: Full length (01:41), 6 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Bright Days In The Countryside: Full length (02:23), 14 Loops, Edits 4, Intro&Outro
  • Butterflies: Full length (01:45), 11 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Delicate Nature: Full length (02:02), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Enjoying Nature: Full length (02:02), 6 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Folksy Orchestral: Full length (01:42), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Fresh Feeling: Full length (02:00), 6 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Gentle Breeze: Full length (02:20), 12 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Good Pals: Full length (01:56), 6 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Happy Donkeys Play The Banjo: Full length (01:56), 7 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Happy Sunshine: Full length (01:56), 7 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Indie Love: Full length (01:19), 5 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Light Leaves Between The Strings: Full length (02:11), 6 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Little Bonfires: Full length (02:06), 7 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Morning In The Woods: Full length (02:13), 11 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Motivated By Nature: Full length (02:09), 13 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Precious Days Together: Full length (01:43), 11 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • River Flowing: Full length (02:10), 6 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Traveling Across Nature: Full length (02:05), 12 Loops, 4 Edits, Intro&Outro


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at Acoustic Vol.2


This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 21 Full length
  • 70 Short edits
  • 177 Loops
  • 42 Intro&Outro


Number of Audio Wavs: 311

Number of Audio Cues: 311

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 2h 44m 04s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
